name: Gengo Cafe
description:
This is an updated version of Gengo Cafe, a project initially released here:

https://benzaitensoftware.itch.io/gengo-cafe

The original was made by myself and Luke Jansen.

------------

FACT SHEET

Developer - Benzaiten Software

Original Release Date - 15 January 2020

 Platform - Android Price - Free

DESCRIPTION

Gengo Cafe is a Language Learning Game that aims to deliver an effective learning experience by using the researched topic of affective filters and content based instruction. To do this the game will use a relaxing, fun and immersive environment for the user

FEATURES ADDED:

  • Voice Lines in conversations
  • Voice Lines for Phrasebook
  • Unlock system for Phrasebook
  • Additional character animations
